divs: Sighting DetailsI was fliming the moon after watching the super bowl at around 7:30 pm. As I was trying to focus the camera, a bright light resembling a Missile shot up from the bottom west by north west from the Monterey Bay into my view of the moon. The object flew diagonally across going up in front of the moon and as it passed the moon, it turned and flew straight up.I was very excited and was hoping that I caught it on flim.AND I DID!!!....WOW!........if someone is out there doing the any real investigating please call ASAP..!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Tried to flim more but no other UFOs......
Summary: Filming the moon and caught an object on video flying accross the moon with great speed. This object then paused, turned and shot straight up into space.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Seaside
There were no other sightings in Seaside on or around February 6th 2011
